did.unittitle: Acknowledgement of Group Insurance by Employees of Star Woolen Company, 1923-1923
did.repository: Kheel Center for Labor-Management Documentation and Archives, Cornell University Library
did.abstract: Letter of acknowledgement of group insurance by employees of the Star Woolen Company of Cohoes, New York, dated December 13, 1923.

scopecontent.p: This collection consists of a letter of acknowledgement of group insurance signed by 101 employees of the Star Woolen Company of Cohoes, New York, dated December 13, 1923.

accessrestrict.p: Access to the collections in the Kheel Center is restricted. Please contact a reference archivist for access to these materials.

userestrict.p: This collection must be used in keeping with the Kheel Center Information Sheet and Procedures for Document Use.

prefercite.p: Acknowledgement of Group Insurance by Employees of Star Woolen Company #6226m. Kheel Center for Labor-Management Documentation and Archives, Cornell University Library.
